element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text:
This algorithm creates a new lines layer with a single line. This line contains as nodes the points from a given points layer. Points are ordered in the same order as they appear in the points layer.
The attributes table of the resulting layer contain the same fields as the one of the input layer. The only line contained in the resulting layer has the values of the first point of the input layer.
A minimum of two points in the input layer is required to run this algorithm.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer with one line creted from the input points.
